field.name: AirSpeedMax
field.description: Vne, i.e. maximum airspeed the airframe can handle

field.name: CruiseSpeed
field.description: Cruise speed in level flight - leave some safety margin

field.name: BestClimbRateSpeed
field.description: V_y, i.e. airspeed at which plane climbs the best

field.name: StallSpeedClean
field.description: Vs1, i.e. stall speed in clean configuration- leave some safety margin

field.name: StallSpeedDirty
field.description: Vs0, i.e. stall speed with flaps and landing gear deployed - leave some safety margin

field.name: VerticalVelMax
field.description: maximum allowed climb or sink rate in guided flight
